name: Dee Ellis
text: Excellent service & great food.   The manager came to the table which I appreciated. However,  Lee was our waiter and he was attentive & polite.   Also,  the staff were cleaning & sanitizing  everywhere and everything but that didn't stop the flies..yuck. Either way,  I felt welcomed & comfortable.

name: Peggy McDowell
